column5: If coming from Detroit, where is the closest place I can pick up a canadian license? Also do thay offer one day, three day options? Thanks for any help Eye-Con

Which Province are you planning on fishing in? this will make a BIG difference. I live in Ontario but I also bought my Quebec license. A seasonal Quebec license cost me 52 bucks, a weekend pass cost 25 bucks!?! E-mail me and I will check the Ontario Regulations book for Ontario, or check out the MNR's site (it's accessible through realfishing.com)
